title: FS: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 50
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 50
posts.post_content:
An amazing high end SGC 50 for sale. No creases or wrinkles. The color saturation of the green background is superb and the focus is perfect. Borders are bright white. I originally bought this card in a PSA holder but I since had it crossed over to SGC. I'm including a PSA scan because it is the best scan I have. My scanner does not scan SGC slabs well at all. You will have a hard time finding another example with better eye appeal. Sorry for the rambling but it's hard to do this card justice. Thanks for looking. Asking $1,150.00

[IMG]http://i101.photobucket.com/albums/m52/DHack3/BB%20Cards/T206CyYoungPortPSA4.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i101.photobucket.com/albums/m52/DHack3/BB%20Cards/T206YoungPort.jpg[/IMG]
Friendly Sunday bump. Email me at [url]dean.hackett@surewest.net[/url] with any questions. Thanks for looking.
Dean, beautiful card.  But I don't get the grade - with no creases or wrinkles, and minimal corner wear, isn't that a no-brainer 'EX'?
Thanks Scott. IMO, there is just a tad too much corner wear to warrant a 5 but it's close. It's definately a no brainer 4.5 no doubt.
Beautiful centering on the card.  Nice looking Young.

[quote name="Runscott" post=964288]Dean, beautiful card.  But I don't get the grade - with no creases or wrinkles, and minimal corner wear, isn't that a no-brainer 'EX'?[/QUOTE]

It's a old PSA grade, which is notorious for under grading.  You send in an early grade PSA T206 and you're pretty much guaranteed to have at least 1 grade higher.
I decided to offer this card again . Asking $1,150. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. thanks for looking.

Going to try once more to sell this beautiful Young Portrait. Asking $1,150 delivered and insured. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Thanks for looking.

[url]dean.hackett@surewest.net[/url]
